languages.text: {n}Вокс техножреца издает звук, похожий на стон гнущейся стальной балки. Сервочереп изрекает:{/n} "Алкая возмездия, иду я тропой возмездия по кровавому следу презренного богохульника".

{n}The sound from the Tech-Priest's vox is like the moan of a bending steel beam. A servo-skull declares,{/n} "For vengeance I thirst as I tread the path of vengeance, following a blasphemous miscreant's bloody tracks."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс техножреца издает звук, похожий на стон гнущейся стальной балки. Сервочереп изрекает:{/n} "Алкая возмездия, иду я тропой возмездия по кровавому следу презренного богохульника".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sound from the Tech-Priest's vox is like the moan of a bending steel beam. Quoth the servo-skull,{/n} "For vengeance I thirst as I tread the path of vengeance, following a blasphemous miscreant's bloody tracks."
traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}技術司祭のヴォクスからの音は折れ曲がる鉄骨のうめき声のようだ。サーヴォスカルが言う。{/n}「報復のために、不道徳な血塗られた跡を辿り報復の道を歩み、報復を渇望する」
languages.original_text: {n}The sound from the Tech-Priest's vox is like the moan of a bending steel beam. A servo-skull declares,{/n} "For vengeance I thirst as I tread the path of vengeance, following a blasphemous miscreant's bloody tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭のヴォクスからの音は折れ曲がる鉄骨のうめき声のようだ。サーヴォスカルが言う。{/n}「報復のために、不道徳な血塗られた跡を辿り報復の道を歩み、報復を渇望する」
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}大块头的声音就像弯曲的钢梁发出的呻吟声，伺服头骨开了口。{/n}“我渴望复仇，于是踏上了复仇的道路，追杀某个亵渎神明的恶徒留下的血腥足迹。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sound from the Tech-Priest's vox is like the moan of a bending steel beam. A servo-skull declares,{/n} "For vengeance I thirst as I tread the path of vengeance, following a blasphemous miscreant's bloody tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}大块头的声音就像弯曲的钢梁发出的呻吟声，伺服头骨发出了声音。{/n}“我渴望复仇，于是踏上了复仇的道路，追杀某个亵渎神明的恶徒留下的血腥足迹。”
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Das Vox des Techpriester klingt, als würde ein Stahlträger gebogen. Der Servoschädel sagt:{/n} "Nach Rache dürste ich auf dem Weg der Vergeltung, folge der blutigen Spur eines blasphemischen Übeltäters."
languages.original_text: {n}The sound from the Tech-Priest's vox is like the moan of a bending steel beam. A servo-skull declares,{/n} "For vengeance I thirst as I tread the path of vengeance, following a blasphemous miscreant's bloody tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox des Techpriester klingt, als würde ein Stahlträger gebogen. Der Servoschädel sagt:{/n} "Nach Rache dürste ich auf dem Weg der Rache, folge der blutigen Spur eines blasphemischen Übeltäters."
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Le son émis par le vox du technoprêtre s'apparente aux grincements d'une poutrelle soumise à forte contrainte. Un servocrâne déclare :{/n} « J'ai soif de vengeance, car telle est la voie que je suis sur les traces sanglantes d'un mécréant sacrilège. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sound from the Tech-Priest's vox is like the moan of a bending steel beam. A servo-skull declares,{/n} "For vengeance I thirst as I tread the path of vengeance, following a blasphemous miscreant's bloody tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le son émis par le vox du technoprêtre s'apparente aux grincements d'une poutrelle soumise à forte contrainte. Traduction du servocrâne :{/n} « J'ai soif de vengeance, car telle est la voie que je suis sur les traces sanglantes d'un mécréant sacrilège. »
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}El sonido del voco sintetizador del tecnosacerdote se parece al gemido de una viga de acero al doblarse. Los servocráneos declaran:{/n} «Pues venganza anhelo y el camino de la venganza recorro, siguiendo el rastro ensangrentado de un blasfemo malhechor».
languages.original_text: {n}The sound from the Tech-Priest's vox is like the moan of a bending steel beam. A servo-skull declares,{/n} "For vengeance I thirst as I tread the path of vengeance, following a blasphemous miscreant's bloody tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sonido del vocosintetizador del tecnosacerdote se parece al gemido de una viga de acero al doblarse. Los servocráneos citan:{/n} «Pues venganza anhelo y el camino de la venganza recorro, siguiendo el rastro ensangrentado de un blasfemo malhechor».
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in voksundan gelen ses, eğilen bir çelik kirişinin çıkardığı uğultuyu andırıyor.{/n} "İntikama susadım. İntikam yolunda yürüdüm. Din düşmanı bir zalimin kanlı izlerini takip ettim."
languages.original_text: {n}The sound from the Tech-Priest's vox is like the moan of a bending steel beam. A servo-skull declares,{/n} "For vengeance I thirst as I tread the path of vengeance, following a blasphemous miscreant's bloody tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in voksundan gelen ses, eğilen bir çelik kirişten gelen inlemeyi andırıyor:{/n} "İntikama susadım. İntikam yolunda yürüdüm. Din düşmanı bir zalimin kanlı izlerini takip ettim."
traits.speaker: Tarzus
